statements: SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC, date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 'abcd-1234' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount <= 500 ORDER BY user_id, date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY history_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_description FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_status='approved';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC, transaction_date DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_amount, th.transaction_status FROM transactions t INNER JOIN transaction_history th ON t.transaction_id = th.transaction_id WHERE th.transaction_status = 'complete';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, t.transaction_amount, th.transaction_description FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_history th ON t.transaction_id = th.transaction_id WHERE th.history_id IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS highest_amount FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount >= 100 AND transaction_amount <= 200 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type='purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT th.history_id, t.transaction_id, c.first_name, p.product_name FROM transaction_history th JOIN transactions t ON th.transaction_id = t.transaction_id JOIN customers c ON th.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON th.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 5

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.transaction_type = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON t.transaction_id = p.product_id
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT id, transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM transaction_categories WHERE category_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.username FROM transactions t INNER JOIN users u ON t.id = u.user_id WHERE u.email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT t.*, a.account_name, a.balance FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN accounts a ON t.transaction_id = a.account_id WHERE t.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;

SELECT tc.category_name, COUNT(*) as total_transactions FROM transactions t INNER JOIN transaction_categories tc ON t.id = tc.category_id GROUP BY tc.category_name HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
